tags: State Publishing House of the RSFSR
title: To the lighthouse of the Communist International (Soviet poster, 1919)
Text: To the lighthouse of the Communist International. Text on the book reads  ‘Karl Marx – Proletarians of the world, unite!’
Publisher: State Publishing House of the RSFSR.
Additional Information: Shows a man on the book of Karl Marx navigating the stormy seas, past the Russian shipwreck and towards the lighthouse.
